title: Creating a Form
body:
Creating a Form¶

A form offers organizations a way to collect data from contacts.
To create a form, follow the steps below.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Forms

  3. Click the in the upper right hand corner

  4. Select a program for which you are creating the form

  5. Enter a form title

  6. Enter a URL for the form

  7. Create a confirmation email

    • Choose a sender

    • Enter the email addess customers will write to if they choose to reply to their confirmation email

    • Enter an email subject

    • Select an existing email template or create a new template

  8. To go back and edit information, click Prev, and to return click Next

  9. Click Save
